title: Reuters reveals Airbus axes remaining A350 jet deal with Qatar Airways
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters was first to report Airbus has revoked its entire outstanding order from Qatar Airways for A350 jets, severing all-new […]

The post Reuters reveals Airbus axes remaining A350 jet deal with Qatar Airways appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was first to report Airbus has revoked its entire outstanding order from Qatar Airways for A350 jets, severing all-new jetliner business with the Gulf carrier in a dramatic new twist to a dispute clouding 2022 World Cup preparations. The two aviation titans have been waging a rare public battle for months over the scarred condition of more than 20 long-haul jets that the airline says could pose a risk to passengers and which Airbus insists are completely safe.

The post Reuters reveals Airbus axes remaining A350 jet deal with Qatar Airways appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
